name: Ladder Room
longDesc: You have entered a room where you see two ladders, one going down and another going up, the up ladder has a section that must be pulled down before use, the section is locked by a combination lock requiring a three number code
shortDesc: There is a down ladder and an up ladder having a section that must be pulled down before use, the section is locked by a combination lock requiring a three number code
feat1desc: ladder leading to the upper level
feat1interactSuccess: You've made it to the upper level
feat2desc: section that must be pulled down to climb up ladder, section locked by three digit comboLock
feat2interactSuccess: That's it, the up ladder is operational
feat3desc: ladder leading down to lower level
feat3interactSuccess: You've made it to the lower level
feat4desc: combination lock locking up ladder section requiring code 666
feat4interactSuccess: Yep, that's it, the comboLock is unlocked
feat4interactFail: no, that's not it, we need a three digit combination
